com.masprop.cluster1.sudoku.controller.dancingLinks
Class DancingLinks

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      com.masprop.cluster1.sudoku.controller.dancingLinks.DancingLinks

public class DancingLinks
extends java.util.Observable

The implementation of the DancingLinks Algorithm inspired from Dr. Knuths papers. www-cs-faculty.stanford.edu/~knuth/papers/dancing.ps.gz

Author:
Anshuman Mehta

 void solve()
          Algorithm to solve If R[h] = h , print current solution return choose a column object c cover column c For each r<-D[c], D[D[c]],..., while r!=c set Ok<-r; For each j<-R[r], R[R[r]],...,while j!=r cover column C[j] search(k+1) set r<-Ok and c<-C[r]; For each j<-L[r],L[L[r],...,while j!=r uncover column C[j] Uncover column c and return
 void unCover(ColumnHeader cHeader)
          Uncover a column For each i <- U[c], U[U[c]], ..., while i != c, for each j <- L[i], L[L[i]], ..., while j != i, set S[C[j]] <- S[C[j]] + 1.

DancingLinks

Method Detail

chooseColumn

protected ColumnHeader chooseColumn()
Choose Column set s <- infinity. for each j <- R[h], R[R[h]], ..., while j != h, if S[j] < s set c <- j and s <- S[j].

cover

public void cover(ColumnHeader cHeader)
Cover a column Set L[R[c]]<-L[c] and R[L[c]]<-R[c] For each i<-D[c],D[D[c]],...,while i!=c for each j<-R[i],R[R[i]],...,while j!=i set U[D[j]]<-U[j],D[U[j]]<-D[j] and set S[C[j]]<-S[C[j]]-1

unCover

public void unCover(ColumnHeader cHeader)
Uncover a column For each i <- U[c], U[U[c]], ..., while i != c, for each j <- L[i], L[L[i]], ..., while j != i, set S[C[j]] <- S[C[j]] + 1. and set U[D[j]] <- j, D[U[j]] <- j. Set L[R[c]] <- c and R[L[c]] <- c.

solve

public void solve()
Algorithm to solve If R[h] = h , print current solution return choose a column object c cover column c For each r<-D[c], D[D[c]],..., while r!=c set Ok<-r; For each j<-R[r], R[R[r]],...,while j!=r cover column C[j] search(k+1) set r<-Ok and c<-C[r]; For each j<-L[r],L[L[r],...,while j!=r uncover column C[j] Uncover column c and return
